desc: Phodal Huang is a geek, creator and author, like to create and share in the real world & virtual world.He like to share software development experiences to help people build better software systems. He has written three books on software development, there are Frontend Architecture: from Basic to Micro-Frontend, Design IoT System and Growth: Thinking in Full Stack. He also was a reviewer of seven books on IoT and frontend development.
